title: Nano-pelargonidin modulates p53/PARP/HSP 90/XRCC1 signaling axis to combat cypermethrin-induced genotoxicity and metabolic dysfunction in fish: a molecular docking predicted in vivo approach
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00965C, Paper
Priyanka Sow, Sudatta Dey, Rishita Dey, Asmita Samadder, Sisir Nandi, Debojyoti Tarafdar, Anisur Rahman Khuda-Bukhsh
Nano-pelargonidin protects CM-induced toxicity in tilapia fish by modulating DNA repair proteins corroborating with molecular docking study.
